title: Elizabeth Oldfield Mugged by Jesus Pursued by the Sacred
summary: Elizabeth Oldfield talks about her upbringing, career, faith crisis, and the work she has done at Theos, a Christian Think Tank. She also discusses her podcast, The Sacred, where she explores spirituality and sacred values. Elizabeth shares her thoughts on the power of attentive listening and the importance of community in building meaningful connections between people. She also mentions her upcoming book "Fully Alive" and the journey of finding wisdom and spirituality in turbulent times. Elizabeth and Paul end the conversation with prayers for each other, expressing gratitude and blessings for their work and lives.
